author: a109495574
txt_content:
scoreboard players add @e[team=red,scores={zding2=0,zd=2},sort=random,limit=1] zding2 1
#execute as @e[team=red,scores={zding2=1,zd=2},limit=1] at @s at @e[team=blue,distance=..15] if score @e[limit=1,distance=0] zdmb = @s zdm run scoreboard players set @s zding 1

execute unless entity @e[team=red,scores={zding2=0,zd=2}] run scoreboard players set @e[team=red] zding2 0
